definition: adopted in order to deceive, something that is a counterfeit, make believe with the intent to deceive
details:
adjective
- adopted in order to deceive
= synonyms: false
noun
- something that is a counterfeit
= synonyms: fake, postiche
- a person who makes deceitful pretenses
= synonyms: fraud
verb
- make believe with the intent to deceive
= synonyms: pretend, affect, feign, dissemble
- make a pretence of
= synonyms: assume, feign, simulate
